definition.jsonSchema: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/schema#","product__v":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"external_id__v":{"description":"External ID","type":"string","maxLength":50},"abbreviation__c":{"description":"Product Abbreviation","type":"string","maxLength":10},"global_id__sys":{"description":"Global ID","type":"string","maxLength":200},"name__v":{"description":"Product Name","type":"string","maxLength":128},"modified_by__v":{"description":"Last Modified By","type":"string"},"modified_date__v":{"format":"date-time","description":"Last Modified Date","type":"string"},"ctn_flag__v":{"description":"CTN Product for Japan","type":"boolean"},"link__sys":{"description":"Link","type":"string","maxLength":255},"cdx_id__v":{"description":"CDX ID","type":"string","maxLength":50},"created_date__v":{"format":"date-time","description":"Created Date","type":"string"},"id":{"description":"ID","type":"string"},"status__v":{"description":"Status","type":"string"},"created_by__v":{"description":"Created By","type":"string"},"ctn_data__v":{"description":"CTN Related Information / 治験届関連情報","type":"string"}}}}}
